title: State benefits doled on caste lines are also leading to ‘caste ferocity’ in society: Madras High Court
selftext: Thankfully the courts have pointed thsis out
comments: Madam was heard saying to a colleague that women asserting their rights is leading to violence against women. /s

I don't get her logic, she claims caste discrimination is not more than 100 years old, and also claims it can't be inferred that the system mentioned in ancient texts has no basis for discrimination seen today, rather it's because of the attempts to provide representation to minorities, which is still lacking. 

This feels like a dog whistle to post retirement benefits.
This is not a dog whistle. this is Creta honking.
